title: Amy Chua-Tiger Mom Controversy
description:
Shukri takes a look at the most recent controversy involving the "Tiger Mom" Amy Chua. The big question that comes up is: who is a public intellectual and who is a professional provocateur? Enjoy the episode and please subscribe!

--- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/classxpodcast/message
